violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Марат' collected but operator did not repeat back or ask for confirmation ('Верно?')

violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Second phone number '903-35-15-39999' collected without echo confirmation. Customer provided '903-35-15-39' then added '9-9-9. В конце.' No repeat-back or confirmation requested.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Search duration 46.1 seconds (from 'Минуту, пожалуйста' to 'Спасибо за ожидание'), exceeds 45-second threshold

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not consistently applied for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Must repeat back ALL contact data (name, phone, address, email) and ask for explicit confirmation using 'Верно?', 'Правильно?', or 'Подтверждаете?' Customer name and second phone number were not confirmed.
First search took 46 seconds. Keep searches under 40 seconds, or check in with customer during longer searches. Consider improving system familiarity or database query efficiency.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name '74 колеса', operator name 'Евгений Коквара', offer to help. Proper closing with thanks and farewell.

7.2.evidence: Customer name 'Марат' and second phone number not confirmed using echo method
7.2.note: First phone number (967-457-79-29) WAS confirmed with 'верно?' which is correct. However, customer name and second phone number violated protocol.

6.1.evidence: No critical silence causing customer hangup. Longest silence was 46s but customer remained engaged.

9.1.note: Subsequent searches were within acceptable range (12.8s and 30.9s)
